whatIs.title: What is
whatIs.text: Guild Wars 2 Armory is an easy way to find, view, and share users, characters, and guilds with your friends on your mobile and PC! Join today and start sharing!

login.name: Sign in
login.joinCta: Don't have an account? Join us!

forgotPassword.name: Forgot My Password
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Check your email for your reset token!
forgotPassword.success: Your password has been changed. Go login!

join.name: Join
join.loginCta: Already have an account? Go login!

images.tooBig: Image should be less than 1MB, choose another.
images.wrongType: Image should be PNG or JPEG, choose another.

stats.name: Statistics
stats.refreshNote: Armory statistics are refreshed every thirty minutes.

search.textbox: Search for users, characters, and guilds
search.minlength: Search term should be 3 or more characters :-)
search.nonefound: Nothing was found... Thought you'd find something?
search.joincta: Join and add your gw2 api token(s) first!

apiKeys.name: Api Keys
apiKeys.noKeysCta: Oh, you have no api keys.. go generate one ..! Make sure you select characters, builds, and pvp permissions :-).
